For someone to effectively compete and win against Android and Apple, it needs significant muscle
For someone to effectively compete and win against Android and Apple, it needs significant muscle, Stephen Elop said, sitting alongside Microsoft boss Steve Ballmer .''[ Mobile] operators need a credible alternative.
